Mask Art is a traditional art inherent in the life of the Balinese people that has a special and unique role in Balinese culture. Some of them are components of dance and theater arts and some are complementary components of religious rituals that must be preserved at any time. Maskology is a place for people to preserve this mask art culture through digital media that is in line with the times.

Masks are an art that has the characteristics of diverse and interesting stories, ranging from royal stories, social life, to legends and mystical things. Many people do not know clearly the meaning and story behind a mask. Maskology makes it easier for people to understand a mask artwork through Mask Story which is integrated with machine learning. Just take a picture of the mask

Now all things are done online through the internet. Especially since the Covid-19 outbreak that forced us to rely on technology has made most of human life done in cyberspace. Businesses that are still conventional are slowly eroding, including mask artists who are starting to lose their income in these conditions. Maskology provides a place for artists to introduce and sell their work to a wider market.
